items.question: Can you print on textured walls?
items.answer: Yes, printing on textured walls is possible, but results depend on the texture. In some cases, paint won’t reach the recesses and will only appear on raised areas. If that’s acceptable, printing can proceed.

items.question: Do you work with client designs?
items.answer: Yes, you can send us an image, create one with AI, or hire a designer. We can remove backgrounds and adapt the layout.

items.question: How to order the service in Finland?
items.answer: Just like in Estonia: fill out the form, the message goes to Telegram, and we’ll contact you.

items.question: How long does the image last?
items.answer: Indoors — 10–15 years or more. Outdoors — from 3 years thanks to UV inks resistant to fading and moisture.
